name: Rune of Durability
text: You inscribe an angular rune upon the surface of a weapon, increasing its hit points. A weapon that bears this rune multiplies its hit points by 2, as if it were one size category larger than it actually is. Placing more than one rune of this type on a weapon has no effect.
text_zh: 你在武器的表面上画下一个简陋的符文，增加其生命值。一个承载符文的武器的生命值会乘以2，就好像它比实际尺寸大了一个体型层次。在武器上放置超过一个以上的符文不会有效果。
